attributes.action: comply with the law and display No Smoking signs at the entrance to 10 Downing Street/
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
From 1 July 2007 every public building in England was required by law to display "No Smoking" signs at it's entrances.   There are no such signs visible when 10 Downing Street appears in the news.
It's a shame to spoil such a fine door but this legislation has disfigured many grand and humble buidings across the nation and the government should fully and clearly comply.

rejection.details: No 10 is not a public building.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
